name: MEEFIE
description: MEEFIE is the first Meet-to-Earn fan-celebrity marketplace that transforms fan engagement through its unique Photostaking feature. Fans can stake digital photos, attend live events, join virtual meet-and-greets, and earn $MFT tokens by actively participating in celebrity interactions. This gamified experience turns passive fans into engaged contributors within a vibrant digital community. For celebrities, MEEFIE offers powerful tools for monetization and brand-building. They can showcase exclusive content, connect more deeply with fans, and earn tokens for their contributions. These tokens can also be donated to charitable causes directly through the platform, allowing celebrities to give back and inspire social impact while growing their fan base. With integrated NFTs, AI-driven features, a tiered rewards system, and user-controlled identities, MEEFIE sets a new standard for fan-celebrity interaction. It’s more than a marketplace—it’s a dynamic, inclusive ecosystem where meaningful connections thrive and both fans and celebrities benefit.
